Venue

Son Mir is a “Finca” (Estate) which dates back to the XVII century and is mentioned in the book written by the Archduke Ludwig Salvator of Austria, “Die Balearum” in which it is listed as being the 10th most important agricultural and livestock farm in Majorca. In other words, we are surrounded by land which has great historical tradition within the framework of the Majorcan estates.
